result.arabic_text: وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَاۖ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡءٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
result.translation: (5) And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth[692] and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat.
result.footnotes: [692]- i.e., in clothing, tents, furnishings, etc.
